product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features a luxurious design centered around promoting elegant jewelry. The background consists of layered vector shapes and gradients forming a soft, romantic texture. At the top, a large header text layer ("heading") showcases the product's charm in a bold serif typeface. Just below, a stylish script font in the "tagline" text layer adds an emotional and affectionate appeal. Key product descriptors are listed clearly in the "description" text layer using a clean, light sans-serif. A product image ("product_image") is centrally placed to emphasize design details. Price is prominently shown in the "price" text layer, while the "cta" text layer with an outlined call-to-action button encourages purchases.

**Color Palette:**
- Rose Pink (#F8BBD0)
- Deep Rose (#C2185B)
- Warm Brown (#4E342E)
- Soft Cream (#FFFFFF)
- Gold Beige (#E6BF83)
product_color: The product image showcases elegant earrings featuring a sophisticated blend of soft rose gold and sparkling clear gemstones. The primary color is a warm **rose gold** (#F4A6A6), used for the setting and floral motif, exuding a luxurious and feminine appeal. Accentuating this are the **crystal white stones** (#FFFFFF) and **diamond clear** (#E1E1E1) elements that add brilliance and texture. The opaque **blush pink** in the petal-like gems (#FADCDC) adds harmony to the design. These colors blend smoothly with rose gold providing a radiant base, while the white and clear tones shine distinctly to highlight details, perfect for an elegant advertisement banner.
